mapper.sql: c.id, c.phoneNumber, c.businessType, c.sendTime, c.msgContent, c.state, c.count, c.erroMsg, c.sendType, c.createTime, c.updateTime, c.version, c.isDeleted, c.createBy, c.updateBy

where 1=1 and c.id = #{condition.id} and c.phoneNumber = #{condition.phoneNumber} and c.businessType = #{condition.businessType} and c.sendTime = #{condition.sendTime} and c.msgContent = #{condition.msgContent} and c.state = #{condition.state} and c.count = #{condition.count} and c.erroMsg = #{condition.erroMsg} and c.sendType = #{condition.sendType} and c.createTime = #{condition.createTime} and c.updateTime = #{condition.updateTime} and c.version = #{condition.version} and c.isDeleted = #{condition.isDeleted} and c.createBy = #{condition.createBy} and c.updateBy = #{condition.updateBy}

where 1=1 and c.id = #{condition.id} and UPPER(c.phoneNumber) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.phoneNumber}),'%')) and UPPER(c.businessType) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.businessType}),'%')) and UPPER(c.sendTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.sendTime}),'%')) and UPPER(c.msgContent) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.msgContent}),'%')) and UPPER(c.state) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.state}),'%')) and UPPER(c.count) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.count}),'%')) and UPPER(c.erroMsg) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.erroMsg}),'%')) and UPPER(c.sendType) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.sendType}),'%')) and UPPER(c.createTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.createTime}),'%')) and UPPER(c.updateTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.updateTime}),'%')) and UPPER(c.version) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.version}),'%')) and UPPER(c.isDeleted) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.isDeleted}),'%')) and UPPER(c.createBy) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.createBy}),'%')) and UPPER(c.updateBy) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.updateBy}),'%'))
mapper.update: update contentsendrecord set phoneNumber=#{phoneNumber}, businessType=#{businessType}, sendTime=#{sendTime}, msgContent=#{msgContent}, state=#{state}, count=#{count}, erroMsg=#{erroMsg}, sendType=#{sendType}, createTime=#{createTime}, updateTime=#{updateTime}, version=#{version}, isDeleted=#{isDeleted}, createBy=#{createBy}, updateBy=#{updateBy}, where id=#{id} and version = #{version}-1
mapper.select: select from contentsendrecord c where c.id = #{id} and c.isDeleted = false
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM `contentsendrecord` c WHERE DATE(NOW()) = DATE(c.`createTime`) AND c.`createBy` = #{id} AND c.`isDeleted` = FALSE ;
